DOC.brief_summary: This study proof concept , multi-center , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group phase 2 dose-ranging study BI 655066/ABBV-066 ( risankizumab ) , IL-23 p19 antagonist monoclonal antibody , patient moderately severely active Crohn 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Pharmacokinetics BI 655066/ABBV-066 ( Risankizumab ) Patients With Active , Moderate-to-severe Crohn 's Disease .
